ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p:
Apple’s Emerging Technology group is looking for an Enterprise Software Engineer to work on a service’s based messaging and data platform.
The candidate would need to demonstrate analytical and organizational skills with proven ability to adapt to a dynamic project development environment.

ul.li: Strong programming expertise in Java, Multi-threading, NIO, Akka, NoSQL and XML technologies.
Implemented solutions that handle high availability and concurrency with low latency requirements.
Hands on experience publishing and consuming services - REST/SOAP.
Experience with relational databases such as Oracle is a must. This would include schema design, writing DML queries and performance tuning queries.
Should have a good understanding of storage solutions.
Should have a strong UNIX background and comfortable writing Unix scripts. Perl will be a plus.
Should be able to performance tune application code and assist team members in reviewing code and provide suggestions to developers.
Exposure to Unix and Mac OS X is desired.

div.p: Development of new code and/or managing existing code as part of a group and/or alone. Ability to develop detailed design and deliver a scalable implementation. Evaluate products including open-source modules and if need be incorporate them into projects. If required willing to take on a technical leadership role
BS degree in computer science or equivalent field with a minimum of 3+ years hands-on programming experience.
